summary.span: 提供对客户端浏览器功能的详细信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to detailed information about the capabilities of the client's browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类的基类。 is the base class from which the class is derived. 提供大量的只读属性，这些属性提供对浏览器功能字典的类型安全访问。 offers a large number of read-only properties that provide type-safe access to a browser's capabilities dictionary. 可以 通过 ASP.NET 属性公开的属性访问类 。You can access the class through the property that is exposed by the ASP.NET property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问有关浏览器的信息。The following example shows how to access information about the browser. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 是无状态协议， `VIEWSTATE` 是用于跨多个请求保存客户端更改的一种机制。HTTP is a stateless protocol, and `VIEWSTATE` is one mechanism used to persist client changes across multiple requests. 网页上的每个控件都包含一个 属性，该属性表示客户端所做的任何更改的累计。Each control on a Web page contains a property, which represents the accumulation of any changes made by the client. 在 Web 窗体页中，这些更改在回发数据中编码为 HTML 元素的，其 `value` `` 属性为 `type` `hidden` 。In a Web Forms page, these changes are encoded in postback data as the `value` of an HTML `` element with a `type` attribute of `hidden`. 例如：For example: ``` ``` 如果为 `true` ，则 `VIEWSTATE` 浏览器将不会正确发送值中的非字母字符，也不会通过中间网关进行。 若要更正此错误，服务器控件适配器会将值中的非字母字符替换 `VIEWSTATE` 为不需要 HTTP 请求编码的字符。To correct this, server-control adapters replace non-alphabetic characters in the `VIEWSTATE` value with ones that do not require encoding in HTTP requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定浏览器是否需要 `VIEWSTATE` 对值进行特殊编码。The following code example shows how to determine whether the browser requires `VIEWSTATE` values to be specially encoded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值可从假定的字符大小和实际屏幕像素大小派生。The returned value can be derived from the assumed character size and actual screen pixel size. 确定高度的算法结合使用默认字体大小 (从 .config 文件) 、特定于浏览器的大小 (、从 .config 文件) 以及浏览器发送的显式标头。The algorithm for determining the height uses a combination of the default font sizes (from a .config file), browser-specific sizes (again, from a .config file), and explicit headers sent by the browser. 某些浏览器可能依赖于内部默认值，这些值仅近似于实际高度。Some browsers might rely on internal default values, which only approximate the actual height.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值可从假定的字符大小和实际屏幕像素大小派生。The returned value can be derived from the assumed character size and actual screen pixel size. 确定宽度的算法使用默认字体大小的组合 (从 .config 文件) 、设备特定大小再次 (、从 .config 文件) 以及设备发送的显式标头。The algorithm for determining the width uses a combination of the default font sizes (from a .config file), device-specific sizes (again, from a .config file), and explicit headers sent by the devices. 这些值不一定精确 (尤其对于可变宽度字体，这些值大致) 。These values are not necessarily exact (especially for variable-width fonts, these values are approximate). 某些设备可能依赖于内部默认值，这些值仅近似于实际宽度。Some devices might rely on internal default values, which only approximate the actual width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cache-control` `http-equiv` HTML 元素的属性的值 `` 允许控制下载内容（包括网页）的客户端缓存。The `cache-control` value for the `http-equiv` attribute of HTML `` elements allows control over client caching of downloaded content, which includes Web pages. 以下 HTML 片段显示了一个示例：The following HTML fragment shows an example: ``` ``` 如果为 `true` ，则在网页的元素中包含此标记 `` 应强制浏览器从服务器重新加载内容。If `true`, the inclusion of this tag in the `` element of a Web page should force the browser to reload content from the server. 如果 `false` 为，则服务器控件适配器将 () 的默认查询字符串附加 `__ufps=``uniquefilepathsuffix` 到尚未包含的链接 URL 值。If `false`, server control adapters append a default query string (`__ufps=``uniquefilepathsuffix`) onto link URL values that do not already have one. 这会强制浏览器从服务器重新加载内容。This forces the browser to reload content from the server. 此 属性还适用于等效的 HTTP 标头形式：The property also applies to the equivalent HTTP header form: ``` CACHE-CONTROL: NO-CACHE ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定浏览器是否支持 `cache-control` `http-equiv` HTML 元素的特性的值 `` 。The following code example shows how to determine whether the browser supports the `cache-control` value for the `http-equiv` attribute of HTML `` elements.
